metadata.Title: CVE-2021-25635 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in LibreOffice, where it improperly validated signatures for algorithms that were not verified. This flaw leads to LibreOffice presenting a valid signature when the validity of the signature was not verified.  The highest threat from this vulnerability is to confidentiality and integrity.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> This CVE is specific to the Microsoft Crypto API backend

criterions.comment: libreoffice: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
